name: Stability Dampers
effectSummary: 后坐-25%，精确补偿命中阈值-1，连续4命中触发额外20真空伤害

name: Adaptive Capacitor
overdriveBonus: 哨戒伤害+10%并在超载时额外提供护盾10
effectSummary: 转为3连脉冲(3×26)，同一目标5次命中触发60感应冲击并减速15%

name: Refractive Lens
effectSummary: 射程+12%，过热恢复+15%，束宽+6px

name: Harmonic Resonance
overdriveBonus: 爆裂后为共振织机提供+1蓄能层
effectSummary: 同一目标持续1.8s后爆裂90AoE并刷新燃烧持续

name: Fragment Loading
overdriveBonus: 裂影回旋首次弹射增加+1目标
effectSummary: 装填-20%，散射角-4°，满散射时暴击率+4%

name: Shrapnel Maelstrom
overdriveBonus: 燃烧区内敌人受到的陷阱伤害+25%
effectSummary: 命中同一目标两次触发90爆炸并留下2秒燃烧区

name: Barbed Chainset
overdriveBonus: 锁链命中时刷新捕捉陷阱冷却-4s
effectSummary: 命中额外拉回3名敌人并附加60穿刺伤害

name: Reckoning Dragnet
overdriveBonus: 领域内敌人被聚拢至虚空收割者中心
effectSummary: 对Boss命中生成2.5s锁链领域，减少敌人移动60%

name: Dual Pulse Core
effectSummary: 命中释放二段脉冲额外55AoE，微弹追踪系数+10%

name: Bloom Singularity
overdriveBonus: 黑洞持续期间共振织机支援范围+20%
effectSummary: 命中点生成2.5s黑洞(30/tick)，聚拢敌人并刷新微弹

name: Calibrated Output
effectSummary: +12%基础伤害，可叠3层，强度与Strength/Insight相乘

name: Rapid Actuator
effectSummary: 攻速+18%，超载冷却+6s，Dominance≥7时额外+4%

name: Quick Load Assembly
effectSummary: 装填时间-20%，对弹匣武器生效

name: Harmonic Sight
effectSummary: 暴击率+6%，暴击伤害+20%，Dominance≥7额外+2%

name: Flux Chamber
effectSummary: 碰撞体积+15%，散射-2°，束光宽度+4px

name: Vector Booster
effectSummary: 投射速度+18%，寿命+0.5s，对WPN-05额外+8%追踪

name: Orbit Stabilizer
effectSummary: 投射寿命+60%，命中后可额外弹跳一次

name: Burst Scheduler
effectSummary: 每次射击追加1发65%威力投射物，热量/弹药消耗相同倍率

name: Shrapnel Loop
effectSummary: 增加1次弹射，伤害-30%，与速度/寿命加成协同

name: Focused Pattern
effectSummary: 散射角-6°，暴击率+6%

name: Cryo Lattice
effectSummary: 命中冻结1.5s或减速60%，与虚空收割者Tier2联动

name: Irradiated Core
effectSummary: 施加持续辐射DoT(10/s,3层)，Insight每点+2%

name: Thermal Brand
effectSummary: 命中触发燃烧20/s持续4s，暴击翻倍

name: Aegis Matrix
effectSummary: 护盾+45，可叠2次，受Endurance与Insight共同影响

name: Orbital Saw
effectSummary: 生成环绕刃每秒55伤害，半径120px

name: Counter Wave
effectSummary: 受击触发1s霸体并反伤60%，冷却12s

name: Vital Infusion
effectSummary: 基础生命回复+2/s，战斗时效果50%

name: Blood Chorus
effectSummary: 吸血4%，束光武器额外+2%

name: Learning Matrix
effectSummary: 经验+25%，拾取半径+60px

name: Scavenger Protocol
effectSummary: 掉落率+18%，Luck每点额外+2%
